item.title: Ease your way into new topics with a learning plan.
item.description: One of my goals for the second half of the year is to help as many people to get a grip on their learning goals for 2019.

item.title: An organizer's lessons on meet-ups and growing a community
item.description: Photo Credit:Christina Morillo Background When starting a community we usually have this long vision of seeing it evolve into a huge impactful part of the domain it belongs to.
